message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,050,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $1,050,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm happy to meet you in the middle. Let's settle on $1,100,000. This would still be a very good deal for you, as you value the product at $1,200,000.
